thread.title: Very pleasant hotel in a great location
thread.title_full: Very pleasant hotel in a great location - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: iloveweekendsaway
title: Very pleasant hotel in a great location
text: Lovely clean hotel, friendly and helpful staff, few minutes walk from coliseum, good breakfast. Just taken one point off because there is no air con and if you open the window at night the street below can be quite noisy. Otherwise great stay.
